website_summaries.verdict: This household name is synonymous with motion sickness relief.
pros: Active ingredient: Dimenhydrinate, 25 mg. Give first dose 30-60 minutes before starting activity
Convenient because you don't need to have water to take the pill
cons: If the taste upsets stomach, consider giving to child after a snack

customer_reviews.title: Give it just before a trip and it works every time
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gets motion sickness if we are in a car or plane for more than 30 minutes. I give it to her just before we get in the car and she doesn't get sick. It's a life saver. Way better than dealing with a sick kid in the car!
customer_reviews.author: lamava

customer_reviews.title: Will use again for future trips
customer_reviews.text: I used it for my 3 year old son who had never travel in bus. We took the bus to Mexico in a 24hour trip and I only had to give it to him 30mins before we boarded and since he was doing so great I did not have to give him the second dosage. On our way back I did exactly the same thing and gave him only one dosage at the beginning and it went as expected. No signs of motion sickness. I even took a dose since I was feeling nauseous from the bus smell and it took effect fast.
customer_reviews.author: Val calixtro

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old suffers from terrible motion sickness si his pediatrician told us to give him one of these any time we had to go somewhere more than 15 minutes away. They don't make him drowsy, but they might not have that effect on everyone. This is apparently the same active ingredient as Benadryl, who knew?
customer_reviews.author: Mr.andMrs.MorenoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Tired to use with our dog
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy get's genuinely car sick, so I got this to try on a shorter trip before I spend the money on prescription meds. Unfortunately it didn't really work for him. The chewable made it a little easier for us to have him actually get it down and the price was good enough to make a trial worth it. Alas we had to go drop the coin on some Cerenia from our vet, which was not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: BS AZ

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker
customer_reviews.text: My child all of a sudden started getting car sick On our hour & half ride to our summer house so we didn’t even want to go back & forth anymore until I researched & found this chewable & since we’ve given him this he has not gotten car sick at all. Thank God because I was even getting anxiety every time we would travel more then 30 min away with my child. It works perfectly. I took one myself one day because I wasn’t feeling too well in the car either & worked for me as well. Definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Works, but be prepared for sleepy kids
customer_reviews.text: My poor kiddo gets so car sick. Even on little 20 minute drives! These are a must for us. I give him one tablet if it's a shorter trip and two if it's longer than an hour. One tablet is okay - it has worked and also has not, depending on the timing. Two is a definite success though it makes him so sleepy. Allow for some rest/downtime if you use these. He says they taste good and doesn't mind taking them, especially since he understands he'll puke if he doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: S.H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for car/boat/plane trips!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for both my 8 & 10 year old children. I've been giving it to them for road trips, flights, boat rides, trips to the amusement park since they were toddlers. Our whole family is VERY prone to motion sickness and this works great of the kids and makes trips etc enjoyable for everyone! Note- I find it does make them slightly drowsy even though it's "non-drowsy"
customer_reviews.author: HSVT

customer_reviews.title: This has been a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old recently began fighting car trips because her tummy hurt and she’d start to commit. I give her half a pill before long car trips and now no complaints. She tends to sleep most of the ride but if fine and energetic when we arrive to wherever we’re going. I still try to avoid long car trips as much as possible and don’t love medications, but This has really been a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey R.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Works!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 year old. His first 5 hour road trip was a disaster. He got sick half way through and kept vomiting. We purchased these because we were going to be making that same trip a month later. We gave to him 30 minutes before we left. About an hour in he fell asleep and didn’t wake until we had an hour left. No vomiting. Happy baby, happy mama.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: I always have these with me
customer_reviews.text: My son suffers from bad motion sickness, particularly in the car. We always have a box or two of these on hand, as they work so well! I like how small the box is, so I can keep it in my diaper bag or purse. We give my son one when we're going to be in the car for awhile and has no problem! I also like that they are chewable. My 4 yo says he doesn't like the taste, but he always takes it with very little complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Prime_momma

customer_reviews.title: This is the only thing that works consistently and lets her enjoy our road trips more without worrying about getting sick
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old has had motion sickness and this is the only product that has alleviated and prevented her symptoms. I had tried other products such as the sea bands and drops, etc. This is the only thing that works consistently and lets her enjoy our road trips more without worrying about getting sick.
customer_reviews.author: Barr22

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 2-year-old nephew and for the first time he did not throw up on a long car ride. He was taken on a super early hour and a half car ride to go blueberry picking, got a little sleepy during the drive but bounced right out of his car seat when they arrived at their destination. Great price, great product!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Villa

customer_reviews.title: My savior for car rides!
customer_reviews.text: I have a verrrrry sensitive carsick kid (20 months). This has actually worked with knocking her out asleep. Maybe it is just my kid, but this works best if given 45-1 hr in advance of the trigger/motion.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon M.

customer_reviews.title: A must for kids with motion sickness!
customer_reviews.text: We love love love these! They don't taste bad and easy to brake in half. The kids can chew them without water and I guess have a nice enough taste to them. They work so well we just give each kid half of a pill. There isn't many pills in the container, like 8 I think, but we love these. I wish they were cheaper, but again they work.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rappleye

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: Our five year old gets carsick on long trips. We finally decided to try giving him this when we drove from Germany to Scotland. It worked perfectly!!! No throwing up for the first time ever and we travel by car a lot. Wanted to add that it did not make him drowsy. He did take a nap half way through the trip but so did I:)
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: it works
customer_reviews.text: My daughter kids motion sickness when traveling and i needed something for her in order to enjoy her trip and not feel nauseous for our family cruise. I was recommended Dramamine by a friend and it worked wonders! my daughter was able to enjoy the ship, run around and play without feeling sick, amazing.
customer_reviews.author: DMary

customer_reviews.title: Back up
customer_reviews.text: We usually use motion eaze topical oil but the trip we are taking is going to be a total of 24–26 hours of driving and I’m not taking any chances. My daughter (7) gets motion sick and I’d rather have alternate options just in case. I thought about using sea bands but feel she will get irritated with the bracelets on her wrists and some people have said they don’t work. So motion eaze and if need be, Dramamine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I give it to my 8-year-old son about 20 minutes before we leave the house and he usually takes a nap - which is great - he talks so much during car rides it is hard to hear the GPS LOL but seriously this works great he gets very car sick so anything over a half-hour ride - Dramamine to the rescue
customer_reviews.author: Forgottenchicken

customer_reviews.title: Aspartame... yuck!
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that these contain aspartame. I wasn't because I didn't think to look for it. What happened to using regular sugar as a sweetener?
customer_reviews.author: SitaMoon

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: I love that this comes in a water-tight plastic case to keep in the car. My little one didnt want to try it at first but once I convinced her to take it before our 5 hour car trip she didnt complain of a belly ache the entire drive (which normally she does ever single time we drive!)
customer_reviews.author: YayaDonaJo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son started getting car sick so easily when I travel be it in car or on the plane. I got this before our trip and I am so glad I did! He usually would get eatrmely fussy during the landing process. This time, he felt great and no fuss at all! I guess we would not be traveling without this in the future
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Must have for motion sickness child
customer_reviews.text: This was great for our plane trips and for days at the amusement park. My daughter gets motion sickness in cars, plane, and rides which usually ends in throwing up. I was heisting because I don’t like to give medicine unless absolutely needing it. She was completely fine! The whole time. It was great. I’ve purchased this twice now and will again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rough 3.5 hour ferry crossing on Lake Superior? No problem.
customer_reviews.text: One tablet enabled our four year-old daughter to easily handle a rough boat trip. By "rough" I mean a 3.5 hour crossing of Lake Superior (Copper Harbor, Michigan to Isle Royale National Park) with 6 foot swells in a 100 foot-long boat. It did knock her out for part of the time, but she was fine while awake. FYI, the rough ride was well worth the experience on Isle Royale! We've also used a half-tab with success for a couple of motion sickness-inducing car rides. They work fast and taste good.
customer_reviews.author: Freeflowing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when want a small dose and are an adult
customer_reviews.text: I can get seasick but the adult strength will put me out. I can easily break in half and take that and if I need to (I have not) can take the other half at a later point. The plastic case it comes in makes it easy to take on the go. The taste is pleasant.
customer_reviews.author: MSW

customer_reviews.title: my 3 year does really well on half a tablet ...
customer_reviews.text: my 3 year does really well on half a tablet. She would throw up on any car ride over 30 minutes, any plane ride, etc. She eats half a tablet and we have NO issues. She even went on all the rides at Disneyland.
customer_reviews.author: boomer806

customer_reviews.title: Helps with motion sickness.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gets motion sickness very easily. Even going across town would trigger it for her. Now I always have this in my purse. I give it to her 20 minutes before we leave the house and we haven't had any problems since. The price on here is about half the price of what you see in stores so I always buy it off Amazon. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Helps my toddler not get car sick
customer_reviews.text: My poor toddler cant go more than 30 minutes now without getting car sick, so now he gets dramamine for those longer trips. He eats it easily and hasnt had issues in the car as long as I remember to give him his medicine.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary K

customer_reviews.title: Had a great cruise!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a cruise and I am prone to sea sickness. Suggestion, do not take these last minute when you are on-board and feeling lousy. Take before boarding so it is in your system to stay ahead of the game. Worked for me and had a great time.
customer_reviews.author: CaptK

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully it works!! My three year old did much better on the ride home from Grandparents house (8hr drive) than she did on the way their without the Dramamine.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Our go to for our long road trips or airplane rides for my son. My so. Has motion sickness when on extended trips. So I take this with us when we head out on a long RoadTrip or airplane ride. It helps almost instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Matters To Me

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter always has car sick if for a long ride, like over 30 min, but since I give this to her about 30 min to 1 hour before the ride, no car sick ever happened, what a relief!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Work great!  Must have in the car!
customer_reviews.text: Saves the day on long car rides for my little one! These are a must if you have a child that gets car sick. My daughter says they taste good and she has no problem taking them for long trips. So far they have worked and we have not had any messes to clean up!
customer_reviews.author: BMessenger

customer_reviews.title: Life saver during kids’ first cruise!
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned my children would become seasick during their first cruise- purchase multiple packs while it was on sale. Kids didn’t mind the taste and did the trick on the nights when the waters were rough.
customer_reviews.author: Claddagh41

customer_reviews.title: May cause drowsiness
customer_reviews.text: Use frequently when flying or long-distance driving with my children who are prone to motion sickness and it works like a charm to keep their nausea at bay. Also makes them both super drowsy and they usually nap well while en route to our destination.
customer_reviews.author: BwHow

customer_reviews.title: Worked wonders!
customer_reviews.text: My poor 7 year old gets motion sickness so bad. We were taking a ferry boat and since he's too young to take the adult version of Dramamine I found this. He said the taste was really good and it helped prevent him from feeling sick on the ferry boat.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect case to keep in travle bag
customer_reviews.text: So perfect for traveling. We recently made a 40 hour round trip car venture and these were a lifesaver to have for my younger 2. The 1 time I forgot to give it to them they both got sick so I absolutely believe that these where why they didn't get sick the rest of the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: I was actually happy that he was asleep but since every review says ...
customer_reviews.text: my kid had fever when he was on board so I gave him some tylenol and dramamine. that knocked him off instantly and lasted for the whole flight (15 hours he was awake for 1 hour or less). I was actually happy that he was asleep but since every review says it won't knock kids off, i'm a little suspicious. Was it tylenol or this or both?
customer_reviews.author: Cecile

customer_reviews.title: Great help for car sickness
customer_reviews.text: My son is very picky but has no problem chewing these. He doesn't get drowsy or car sick while taking these
customer_reviews.author: Shane & Leah Gunderson

customer_reviews.title: Effective for adults too
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I bought this for myself. I don’t get as drowsy with this as I do with the adult version, but it prevents motion sickness. I’m an average sized adult, not tiny.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Dependable and convenient
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works like a charm. My middle son gets car sick on every single road trip lasting longer than 1 hour, so Dramamine is lifesaver. He's old enough that he can swallow the adult pill, halved, but he'd MUCH prefer this chewable kind - especially if he's already starting to feel a bit queasy and doesn't want to have to drink anything in order to take this medicine.
customer_reviews.author: Mpk2468

customer_reviews.title: Worked!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked well! We went on an excursion last year and our son got sick and vomited, so i bought this product and when we returned this year, we went on the same excursion and no sickness!
customer_reviews.author: Rose O.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best taste but it works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money and this is the only one that really helps my kid’s for long car rides. They don’t love the taste but it works!
customer_reviews.author: KZambranny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and carry.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Worked great for my kids on the flight. (2-4) 4+ hour flights. I gave them a 1/2 pill each 30 ish min before each flight. Even helped my husband and I with some nausea without getting sleepy. We took a whole one each. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really needed these
customer_reviews.text: I use 1/2 a tab an hour before a road trip for my 21 pound welsh terrier that gets car sick. They are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Needed for motion sickness
customer_reviews.text: It prevents my kids from motion sickness. We won’t fly without using it. My son thought he could go without it. He was wrong. Sick entire trip from NY to CA. Now he takes it each time we fly.
customer_reviews.author: susan walpole

customer_reviews.title: Works good for long trip.
customer_reviews.text: I used on my 4 years old son when we traveled overseas and works fine.I don’t recommend to use more then one day.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Fryer

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: My son didn’t complain about the texture or taste. I tell him it’s his vitamins whenever we’re on the road for long trips and he’s takes them w ease
customer_reviews.author: PatM.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling with kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our road trip from OR to CO with our 2yo. Really helped! Small and compact. Easiky told my son it was a vitamin and he took it easily!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Works for our kids
customer_reviews.text: Give our 2-year-old daughter a half tablet to reduce her episodes of vomitting in the car. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a family cruise. Kids ended up not needing it, but wife did. We calculated the dosage accordingly for an adult, and it helped with her seasickness.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick C

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would come w/ alot more pills then it did but w/ that being said, my 1yr old would ALWAYS end up throwing up everywhere anytime we'd drive anywhere. But she hasnt 1 time since ive used these for her
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my toddler on a long road trip! She didn’t get sick once!
customer_reviews.author: Car

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Game Changer.
customer_reviews.text: Total game changer. Our child has awful terrible car sickness- like throw up 12 times on a 4 hour trip, barfs their guts out 20 minutes down the road- car sick. This little tablet has changed our lives. We only give them half and they're covered for like 6 hours. We haven't had an accident once when they've used it and it makes our kid comfortable and happy, instead of miserable and anxious. Again, total game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: MIRACLE WORKER
customer_reviews.text: 2 year old loves the taste. Chewable and works within 30 min of giving it.
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Works for our toddler, but start with a half pill
customer_reviews.text: A half pill in the morning and a half pill in the evening worked out perfectly for our 3 year old -- he never got sick during our 7 day cruise. It did make him a little sleepy, but not overly drowsy or unable to function. The first night we gave him a full pill and he complained about being unable to stand up, so that's perhaps too much for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Robert P

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We can’t go anywhere with our son without these. Seriously works for motion sickness!
customer_reviews.author: Heather J-Garner

customer_reviews.title: So tired of being covered in puke during car rides ...
customer_reviews.text: So tired of being covered in puke during car rides with my daughter. I give her one, she sleeps, and I don't need a shower when I arrive some place. Win-win! (It does make her very drowsy, so I only use it on long car rides. For short rides they have a non drowsy formula but she's 4 so I try to mix it into a drink, but she can still tell its there as it has a weird taste.)
customer_reviews.author: Kim  Y

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t make my son drowsy at all
customer_reviews.text: Took my son on a Disney cruise. Gave this to him and he didn’t have any trouble with sea sickness. I expected it to make him drowsy but I didn’t notice any effects.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed at an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: I have to use these for my daughter when we travel. It is so much cheaper than other stores.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more sick bags needed!!
customer_reviews.text: My son (7) always gets car sick. These have been a game changer for driving anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Kae

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Keep in our car as our son has motion sickness. Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah A. Gable

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long for my 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: They lasted a few hours. Took just under 30 min to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price and works well!
customer_reviews.text: My son gets car sick quite easily. This works wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Product does help!!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old was throwing up all night so we ordered dramamine and as soon as we got them, we gave her one and it immediately stop the symptoms!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Av

customer_reviews.title: great flavor
customer_reviews.text: it tastes good enough for my daughter to just chew it rather than swallowing. I dont know if it worked for sea sickness since she never complained about it to begin with. but definitely helped my daughter fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked great!! My daughter loved the flavor. This came very handy on our 11 hrs road trip. Next 14 plane trip.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Works.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but so little amount in the package. Must take about an hr before getting in boat/car/ plane.
customer_reviews.author: California Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware! Very misleading! 8 count pack of ...
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware! Very misleading! 8 count pack of 2 really means you are getting only 8 tablets. There are two small packs of 4 in the container. Since you are given the choice of a single pack or the pack of two, you are led to believe you are getting two whole packages which would total 16. What a rip-off!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Stewart

customer_reviews.title: They worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my 7 year old son. I don't have to pull over anymore.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn c

customer_reviews.title: Better price on Amazon than in the store (actually the ...
customer_reviews.text: Better price on Amazon than in the store (actually the only store I could find the Children's version of Dramamine was one small grocers store in town). Even as an adult, I would take half of one of these. They work well. Bought them for on a few vacations through the mountains. We have all taken these, easy to tolerate.
customer_reviews.author: Chede

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our cruise My daughter and my aunt took them! They melt right away!
customer_reviews.author: nOUSHIN HORNBUCKLE

customer_reviews.title: SUPER HAPPY MOMMY OVER HERE!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!!!! Amazing! My two children always have motion sickness. They always complain of their tummies hurting them and even end up throwing up almost ALL the time. We went on a 3 hour and 45 min drive, I gave them this 30 mins before leaving and it was perfect! No crying, complaining and most importantly no throwing up in the car. It was the most pieceful drive we have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Janetza

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect case for traveling. Easy to use for car or plane
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great my son does not get sick. Gets a little sleepy
customer_reviews.author: DHunz

customer_reviews.title: helps with my motion sickness and doesn't make me feel like i'm still on the plane when i shower at ...
customer_reviews.text: i ordered these not for kids but for me.. i'm 30 and take these before my flights. helps with my motion sickness and doesn't make me feel like i'm still on the plane when i shower at night.
customer_reviews.author: Yuri

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my daughter who gets sick in boats. It worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Leila

customer_reviews.title: Portable and peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I didn't need it yet but having it helped with that
customer_reviews.author: Miss Biddy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find in store ! Works great for travel
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for our cruise
customer_reviews.text: I gave my child 1/2 a tablet even though the recommendation was for more. It was plenty to help her get used to being at sea.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Mesina

customer_reviews.title: 12 hour trip and no vomiting!
customer_reviews.text: 12 hour trip and no vomiting! Worked like a charm for my 7 year old who always throws up during a long trip. Not today!!🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It work for my daughter !
customer_reviews.text: it is great and it work for my daughter, but 1 star to deduct is my daughter don't like the taste. it is better if more choice of the taste!
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for car sickness and easy to store and go.
customer_reviews.author: Sullivan Family

customer_reviews.title: Works super fast and works for adults too!
customer_reviews.text: This product works instantly! I get carsick easily and can always count on this to save the day. The dose is half of the adult one. I usually take one and it does the trick with less drowsiness from smaller dose, and I’ll take two if needed. These work great for my kids too - a road trip must have.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My kid gets sick and throws up on every road trip with this product i gave my son a half of tablet to eat and we drove 20hrs and he did not get car sick once I highly recommend it to any parent who child get motion sickness he did not like the taste to much but drank juice after and was fine
customer_reviews.author: Amani Bullock

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 2 and gets car sick. This gave me the peace of mind every mother needs! Side effects include drowsiness. So she slept for a good amount of time. DEFINITELY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Live Saver for a car sick child
customer_reviews.text: Take these before you get sick for best effect. These work really well.
customer_reviews.author: C. L. F.

customer_reviews.title: Dramamine is the best
customer_reviews.text: Myself and my children both suffer from motion sickness during long car rides. Dramamine is the only product I trust to keep use from turning green🤢

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: My kids didn't get sick on the plane rides at all!!

customer_reviews.title: work like charm on my cruise .. would recommend whoever is taking cruise
customer_reviews.text: work like charm on my cruise .. would recommend whoever is taking cruise

customer_reviews.text: I have kids that get carsick and this helps when needed! It’s been such a relief to have it when needed.

customer_reviews.title: Magic
customer_reviews.text: This saved my car from a pukefest on vacations. I have a 3 yo and an 8 yo. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Best price anywhere for kids Dramamine - I have it ...
customer_reviews.text: Best price anywhere for kids Dramamine - I have it on auto-ship so we never run out! A must for all our family adventures!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca K

customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my 4 year old when we went on a cruise.

customer_reviews.title: amazon is the best when it comes to purchasing these
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to find dramamine kids for our two kids who get car sick, air sick, etc. The price and with prime, amazon is the best when it comes to purchasing these! Keeps our kids from getting sick and they can enjoy themselves on the plane and car without feeling miserable!
customer_reviews.author: ellen lee

customer_reviews.title: These works wonders! My two year old couldn't go ...
customer_reviews.text: These works wonders! My two year old couldn't go on a car ride longer than 15 mins because she would get car sick. Now, we give her half a pill 30 mins before we go out and no more car sickeness. Make sure it's at LEAST half an hour before you go out otherwise they won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We are so glad we found this product
customer_reviews.text: With a child who gets car sick on trips that last any longer than 90 minutes and family and friends who live far away, this is a MUST. We are so glad we found this product. We keep it in stock ALWAYS!

product_meta.title: Dramamine Motion Sickness Relief for Kids | Chewable Grape | 8 Count
product_meta.description: Dramamine for Kids is the only medicated motion sickness relief product formulated just for children ages 2 12 from the #1 Pharmacist Recommended brand. It treats symptoms on the spot, preventing nausea, dizziness and vomiting. Dramamine for Kids has a safe, precise dose in a fun, chewable grape flavor and it comes in a convenient, portable travel case ideal for car rides, boat rides, and airplane trips! Always bring Dramamine with you! You don't want to be caught in the air, on the water, or on the road without Dramamine. Thirty three percent of all kids ages 2 12 suffer from motion sickness. Dramamine is the only leading brand to have developed a solution formulated specifically for children 2 years and older, not only preventing nausea, vomiting and dizziness but also treating symptoms on the spot. Here are some tips: 1. If your child is prone to motion sickness or if he/she unexpectedly begins to feel motion sick during a trip, tell him or her to look out at the horizon and focus on a non moving object. An older child might feel better sitting in the front seat, too. 2. Get fresh air. Sit outdoors with your child (on a boat), or open a window (in a car or bus) when possible. The fresh air helps distract from those oogly booglies. 3. The last thing a parent wants to hear from a child is, “I’m gonna be sick!” This is why one of the most important items to pack when traveling with children is a bag or bucket. Be sure to keep it close at hand, too. It won’t do you any good buried beneath a pile of suitcases in the trunk. 4. Ginger is a spice renowned for its ability to soothe an upset tummy. Pack a few ginger infused, low sugar candies in your day pack as a sweet distraction for your little one during your journey. 5. Use a distraction. Take your child’s mind off the motion sickness by playing music (on headphones on a plane). Anything that requires too much thinking, like playing a game or reading books, probably will just make things worse. 6. Pack some protein. Avoid giving your child too many sugary treats, which can make them shaky. Don’t overeat either. Instead, stick to small, protein packed snacks like a handful of nuts, a protein bar, or peanut butter crackers. Not only is Dramamine the most trusted over the counter treatment for motion sickness, it is the #1 Pharmacist Recommended brand to both prevent and treat the condition.
feature_bullets: The only medicated motion sickness relief product formulated just for children ages 2 12
Treats and prevents nausea, dizziness and vomiting
Safe, precise dose in a fun, chewable grape flavor
#1 Pharmacist Recommended brand for motion sickness
8 chewable tablets in a travel case

specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
